snippet: In “The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death,” a ghost with a vendetta against the young leaves behind the Edwardian setting of its predecessor for 1941.
abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews movie The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death, directed by Tom Harper and starring Phoebe Fox.
lead_paragraph: In “The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death,” a ghost with a vendetta against the young leaves behind the Edwardian setting of its predecessor for 1941.
